review: The Fire TV stick is GREAT! I have a chromecast, and in my opinion the fire stick beats it hands down. I use this device for prime tv shows and movies. It is snappy and responsive for what I need it to do. It is SO close to be a replacement for my HTPC, but it does not do "live" tv well. I have to side load xbmc to get it to pickup my hdhomerun streams. That means I don't get a guide.This was not made to do live tv, so... for what it does. It is perfect for me.

author: Shannon Dillon

review: I will preface this review by saying I am not a techy person. I am also not usually an early adopter, but when I was able to preorder it for less than $20, I jumped on it.  I love my Fire TV stick. It does what I was expecting -- it allows me to watch my Prime movies and TV shows. As an added bonus, I'm able to listen to my Prime music as well via my TV.Installation was quick and easy. 10 minutes and we were good to go. The hardest part was typing in the wifi password. The only thing I don't like is that I have to scroll through my Watchlist to find shows. I have a lot of shows in my Watchlist, so it can take awhile. There's probably a search function I just haven't found yet.
